name: send_voice_message
description: Send a voice message via Discord using Eleven Labs TTS. The text will be converted to speech and sent as an audio message. Use this when you want to communicate with voice rather than text - for emphasis or when tone matters. Maximum 3000 characters.

message.description: The text message to convert to speech and send (max 3000 chars). Speak naturally - the TTS will capture your tone and emotion. Keep it conversational and authentic.

target.description: Discord user ID or channel ID to send to (optional - defaults to DEFAULT_USER_ID)
